original_body_lines: Former cricketer Lasith Malinga posted a special message on Facebook thanking social media users for helping him track down a nine-year-old boy whose bowling action had caught his attention.
In a message, Malinga said he spoke to the parents of nine-year-old Dineth Anuhas of Weerawila to discuss the possibility of coaching the child to play cricket at school.
He said the child whose bowling action had caught his attention, has the capability of becoming a better bowler than him, if Dineth wishes to play cricket at the school level.
